main.name: Mohammad Ali
main.description: Software/Embedded, MLOps, C++ Programming & Full-Stack Web Developement
main.bio: My name is Mohammad Ali Ghorbani. Currently, I'm involved in a Software Engineering position as a C++ developer for merchant systems. I finished my BS.c. in Electrical Engineering at AmirKabir University of Technology, Tehran, (2015-2020); I have some experience in the Computer industry as A Software/Hardware Engineer for the last 5 years mostly ML/AI Engineering, C++/Python programming, Hardware-Level algorithm implementing, and Web Developing (JS, PHP, and Python) .
main.contactmessage: Get in touch with me to receive further details on how I can help your business reach further.

work.description: implementing software for image/voice processing, machine vision, developing high performance low-level system applications (Intel CPUs and Nvidia GPUs), developing Enterprise native desktop applications for Windows and Linux
items: Implementing C++ versions for AI(ML/CNN) applications for production
Developing low level scripts, targetting Nvidia GPUs (CUDA) and Intel CPUs(IPP,MKL)
Implementing Image/Voice processing algorithms to work in the native apps (using C++/Tensorflow/LibTorch/GSL).
Developing web applications with Django and express.js and React.js

testimonials.text: Here you should write some nice things that someone has said about you. No lies though, employers can tell when you are lying.

That Sonny Sangha must be one of the most brilliant developers I've ever met! It is amazing that nobody has hired him yet. Hey you, you should hire this guy, he may be fresh out of University and have zero on the job experience but I am confident that he will be one of your best developers in no time!
